data.message:
With all the controversy hitting the plane... of judges and laywer 's still no drama or change; self made, self proof, and you still think you did something to make it all grey. 
I'm not good at rapping and I have more to say, but just like Eminem I will sing it away
I dare him to put his money into antibullying on all Creed's.
It's one idea to think or talk about it, but another to prevent it; and hate isn't the answer; it's a great start to a beginning; but a fine line should envoke an ending
This response is related to ur song" no love" I met you once and believed.
